intro.para1: I am a student of Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Internet of Things in my Junior year in Vellore Institute of Technology.
intro.para2: My academic studies unfold through a series of projects that engaged critical design analysis in distinctive ways and innovated experimentations through multidisciplinary approaches. With strong interst in Web Developement I have built several different technologies including but not limited Angular, React, Python, C++ and Java.
intro.para3: I am currently looking for internship opportunity in the field of software development for closely working with a highly reputed organization and enhance my skill set.
